          <title>
            <string language="en">Water wave movement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserwelle Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de vague de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento da onda da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento dell'onda dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση κυμάτων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de la onda del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram of water waves shows the movement of each part of the water surface and the direction of the waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm der Wasserwellen zeigt die Bewegung
jedes Teils der Wasseroberfläche und der Richtung der Wellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme des vagues de l'eau montre le 
mouvement de chaque partie de la surface de l'eau et de la direction 
des vagues.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de ondas da água mostra o movimento 
de cada parte da superfície da água e do sentido das ondas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema delle onde dell'acqua mostra il 
movimento di ogni parte della superficie dell'acqua e del senso delle 
onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα των κυμάτων ύδατος εμφανίζει τη 
μετακίνηση κάθε μέρους της επιφάνειας ύδατος και της κατεύθυνσης
των κυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama de las ondas del agua muestra el 
movimiento de cada parte de la superficie del agua y de la dirección 
de las ondas.</string>
          </description>
